code: import{OPEN_MODAL,CLOSE_MODAL}from"../actions/modal_actions";export default function modalReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case OPEN_MODAL:return action.data;case CLOSE_MODAL:return null;default:return state;}}
